projects.title: Financial Services - Early Warning System
projects.description: Development of an Early Warning System using Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Python Machine Learning algorithms to automate alerts generation of news and market data on Risk Managers customer portfolio (currently around 300 users and expecting more than 1k in future). In a daily basis and near real-time, GCP is handling around 300k articles (retrieved from Financial Times and Google News), automatically translating it from more than 50 languages to English and tagging the articles (with specific subjects like Fraud and Human Rights) using 9 machine learning models developed in Python. GCP also handles more than 500k calls per day to retrieve financial instruments information from external and internal sources.

projects.description: Big Data assessment with the aim to propose an architecture and strategy capable of dealing with all the information needs. volunteer_experiences.description:
The experience: www.ikoporan.org/teaching-school-india

Teaching English at a Community school in India, situated in the southern part of Jaipur. Since the school is catering to children from an economically weak & marginalized area, quality English teaching with all other required amenities provided are a great advance for the young students. There were around 54 students who are studying in 1st to 5th grades. As a volunteer I taught the students the necessary things that will help them in developing their interpersonal skills.

Indian Organization: Aii Group

volunteer_experiences.role: Preparation of food to homeless people.
